title: How to Fold a Napkin Into a Cockscomb

steps.headline: Place your napkin in the shape of a diamond.
Make sure the four loose edges are at the top.
Fold from top to bottom, forming a triangle.
Rotate the napkin.
steps.description: Make sure the four loose edges are still on top.

steps.headline: Imagine a line down the middle of the napkin.
steps.description: Fold one side into the middle.

steps.headline: Fold the other side into the middle.
Flip the napkin over, folding the two bottom flaps up.
Fold the napkin in half; side to side.
Hold the napkin in the palm of your hand.
Slightly gripping the napkin, find the first layer on top and gently pull.
Find the second layer and gently pull.
Find the third layer and gently pull.
Find the final layer and gently pull.
Place your finished Cockscomb on the table.

text: Place your napkin in the shape of a diamond.  Make sure the four loose edges are at the top.  Fold from top to bottom, forming a triangle.  Rotate the napkin. Make sure the four loose edges are still on top. Imagine a line down the middle of the napkin. Fold one side into the middle. Fold the other side into the middle.  Flip the napkin over, folding the two bottom flaps up.  Fold the napkin in half; side to side.  Hold the napkin in the palm of your hand.  Slightly gripping the napkin, find the first layer on top and gently pull.  Find the second layer and gently pull.  Find the third layer and gently pull.  Find the final layer and gently pull.  Make any necessary adjustments.  Place your finished Cockscomb on the table.
